item.title: Jude 1
item.description:
Jude Chapter 1

1 Jude, servant of-Jesus Christ and brother of-James, to-the-ones having-been-beloved by God (the) Father and having-been-kept by-Jesus Christ, elect. 2Mercy to-you and peace and love be-multiplied.

3 Beloved, making all diligence to-write to-you about the shared salvation of-us, I-had necessity to-write to-you, urging (you) to-keep-contending-strongly for-the faith once-and-for-all delivered to-the saints. 4For some men sneaked-in-under-false-pretenses, the-ones long-ago having-been-written-beforehand to this [the] condemnation, ungodly, having-perverted the grace of-[the] our God into sensuality, and denying the only Master and Lord of-us Jesus Christ.
